data.title: How Amazon’s delivery robots will navigate your sidewalk
data.text: Earlier this year, Amazon announced its Scout sidewalk delivery robot. At the time, details were sparse, except for the fact that the company had started to make deliveries in a neighborhood in Washington State.

data.title: Jeff Bezos interrupted by protester, says space exploration is necessary to 'save the Earth'
data.text: At Amazon’s Re:MARS conference in Las Vegas on Thursday, an animal rights protestor rushed up on stage where CEO Jeff Bezos was engaged in a “fireside chat” interview by Amazon’s Director of Forecasting, Jenny Freshwater.

data.title: Amazon: Dig Deeper
data.text: In the long term, companies often demonstrate a direct relationship between ROE and P/BV.

data.title: Jeff Bezos wants to build the infrastructure for space startups
data.text: At its re:Mars conference, Amazon’s CEO Jeff Bezos took the stage today to be “interviewed” by Jenny Freshwater, Amazon’s director of forecasting.

data.title: Amazon CEO Bezos says robotic hands ready for prime time in next 10 years
data.text: Jeff Bezos, Amazon.com Inc's chief executive and founder, said on Thursday he expects the challenge of building robots for commercial use that can grasp items as efficiently as human hands will be solved in the next 10 years.

data.title: New government pressure could mean the end of tech mega deals
data.text: Regulatory scrutiny of tech giants could hurt their ability and appetite to do mega deals.

data.title: Amazon Drone Deliveries Are Almost Here
data.text: The e-commerce giant unveiled a new unmanned aerial vehicle on the same day it received FAA approval for drone deliveries. Here's what it could mean.

data.title: Why Investors Should Pay Attention FAANG
data.text: Some of the top headlines driving the markets: FAANG.

data.title: Amazon's New Drones to Boost E-commerce Delivery Abilities
data.text: Amazon (AMZN) introduces electric delivery drone with the approval from Federal Aviation Administration.

data.title: Amazon Unveils 'Hybrid' Drone Design With 'Independently Safe' Capability
data.text: Amazon.com, Inc. (NASDAQ: AMZN) on Wednesday unveiled a "hybrid" design for its autonomous delivery drones that the company said will enable the machine to more easily transition between a helicopter-like vertical mode for take-off, to an airplane mode while in transit, and then back to the vertical mode for landing.

data.title: Amazon, reeling from recent regulatory hurdles, pumps $404M into its India business
data.text: Following months-long intense regulatory setback in India, Amazon is moving back to spending big bucks to grow its business in the world’s second largest internet market. Amazon has infused Rs 2,999 crores ($404 million) in its India business, according to a regulatory filing published this week.

data.title: Amazon Picked by NASCAR as Cloud Provider, AWS Base Expands
data.text: Amazon's AWS has been selected by National Association for Stock Car Auto Racing (NASCAR) as its cloud-based provider.
